triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: Core technology that is the focus of the survey on collaborative communication systems.

triples.name: Wireless network
triples.relevance: Essential for establishing communication links between UAVs in collaborative swarms.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Provides theoretical foundation for designing flexible control strategies in UAV systems.

triples.name: Autonomous agent
triples.relevance: Key concept for autonomous collaboration and coordination in multi-UAV systems.

triples.name: Swarm robotics
triples.relevance: Provides methodologies for UAV swarm behavior and decentralized coordination.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Fundamental framework for understanding collaborative decision-making in UAV swarms.
